** As per PCS ROC report dated September 29, 2025 issued by M/s Vivek J. Vakharia & Associates, ROC Form is not traceable, we have relied on minutes dated September 27, 1985 of the Company.

^As per certificate dated September 29, 2025 issued by Shah & Patel, the shares were issued at face value of ₹1000 each and against the same, the company has called ₹100 initially and later on 09.02.2008 balance sum of ₹ 900 were called.
